body_html:
is there any plan that when should pytorch support CSR/CSC format? most of these operation will be cheap if using CSR/CSC.

for these special case, i guess we don't need really allocate more memories since every value should be repeated and only be used as a intermedia value?

Besides, if the cuSPARSE and MKL didn't offer these implementation, does that mean that we need more effort to utilize the multiprocess?

body:
is there any plan that when should pytorch support CSR/CSC format? most of these operation will be cheap if using CSR/CSC.

for these special case, i guess we don't need really allocate more memories since every value should be repeated and only be used as a intermedia value? 

Besides, if the cuSPARSE and MKL didn't offer these implementation, does that mean that we need more effort to utilize the multiprocess?
